sentence.Network_en: Captain Cook safely navigated his ship without accident for 100 voyages.
sentence.Network_cn: 库克船长驾驶的船安全出航100次无事故。

sentence.Network_en: The space shuttle Atlantis returned safely to earth today.
sentence.Network_cn: “亚特兰蒂斯”号航天飞机今天安全返回地球。

sentence.Network_en: We can build up the speed gradually and safely.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们可以逐渐稳妥地提高速度。

entry.def: If something is done safely, it is done in a way that makes it unlikely that anyone will be harmed.

example.ex: The waste is safely locked away until it is no longer radioactive...
example.tran: 废料被安全储存起来，直到其不再有辐射性。

example.ex: 'Drive safely,' he said and waved goodbye...

entry.def: You also use safely to say that there is no risk of a situation being changed.

example.ex: Once events are safely in the past, this idea seems to become less alarming...
example.tran: 一旦那些事件尘封为历史，这个想法似乎就变得不那么可怕了。

example.ex: The number two seed is safely through to the second round of the tournament.
example.tran: 二号种子顺利地进入了锦标赛第二轮。

means.word_mean: 1. with safety; in a safe manner;

auth_sentence.content: Then, the hard part begins - landing safely.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then, the hard part begins - landing safely.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then, the hard part begins - landing safely.

auth_sentence.content: Nuclear is much better if it's implemented safely.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nuclear is much better if it's implemented safely.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nuclear is much better if it's implemented safely.

auth_sentence.content: He wants to make sure people use vaccines safely.
auth_sentence.res_content: He wants to make sure people use vaccines safely.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He wants to make sure people use vaccines safely.

sentences.en: Ensure that all the waste is properly and safely disposed of.
sentences.cn: 一定要适当且安全地处理所有废料。

sentences.en: All the passengers were safely taken off the burning ship.
sentences.cn: 全部乘客都被从起火的船上安全地搭救出来。

sentences.en: All your troubles will vanish away when he returns safely.
sentences.cn: 他平安回来后,你就无忧无虑了。

sentences.en: It may be safely assumed that there is no animal life on Mars.
sentences.cn: 可以有把握地认为火星上是没有动物生命的。

sentences.en: I think we can safely assume that this situation will continue.
sentences.cn: 我想我们可以有把握地认为这种情况将持续下去。

sentences.en: Are all the boxes safely lashed up?
sentences.cn: 这些箱子都牢牢地捆起来了吗?

sentences.en: The baby loved being thrown up into the air and safely caught again.
sentences.cn: 这个婴儿喜欢被抛起来再被稳稳地接住。

sentences.en: Just when I put the glass safely down on the table,the cat jumped up and knocked it off.
sentences.cn: 我刚把杯子稳稳当当地放在桌子上,猫就跳上去给弄倒了。
